entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
